verses.verse: And it came to <S%H1961>pass,<s%> <S%H3588>that<s%> when <S%H3327>Isaac<s%> was <S%H2204>old,<s%> and his <S%H5869>eyes<s%> were <S%H3543>dim,<s%> so that he could not <S%H4480>see,<s%> <S%H7200><s%> he <S%H7121>called<s%> <S%H853><s%> <S%H6215>Esau<s%> his <S%H1419>eldest<s%> <S%H1121>son,<s%> and <S%H559>said<s%> <S%H413>unto<s%> him, My <S%H1121>son:<s%> and he <S%H559>said<s%> <S%H413>unto<s%> him, <S%H2009>Behold,<s%> here am I.
And he <S%H559>said,<s%> <S%H2009>Behold<s%> <S%H4994>now,<s%> I am <S%H2204>old,<s%> I <S%H3045>know<s%> <S%H3808>not<s%> the <S%H3117>day<s%> of my death: <S%H4194><s%>

Now <S%H6258><s%> therefore <S%H5375>take,<s%> I pray <S%H4994>thee,<s%> thy <S%H3627>weapons,<s%> thy <S%H8522>quiver<s%> and thy <S%H7198>bow,<s%> and go <S%H3318>out<s%> to the <S%H7704>field,<s%> and <S%H6679>take<s%> me some <S%H6718>venison;<s%>

And <S%H6213>make<s%> me savory <S%H4303>meat,<s%> such <S%H834>as<s%> I <S%H157>love,<s%> and <S%H935>bring<s%> it to me, that I may <S%H398>eat;<s%> <S%H5668>that<s%> my <S%H5315>soul<s%> may <S%H1288>bless<s%> thee <S%H2962>before<s%> I <S%H4191>die.<s%>

And <S%H7259>Rebekah<s%> <S%H8085>heard<s%> when <S%H3327>Isaac<s%> <S%H1696>spoke<s%> <S%H413>to<s%> <S%H6215>Esau<s%> his <S%H1121>son.<s%> And <S%H6215>Esau<s%> <S%H1980>went<s%> to the <S%H7704>field<s%> to <S%H6679>hunt<s%> for <S%H6718>venison,<s%> and to <S%H935>bring<s%> it.

And <S%H7259>Rebekah<s%> <S%H559>spoke<s%> <S%H413>unto<s%> <S%H3290>Jacob<s%> her <S%H1121>son,<s%> <S%H559>saying,<s%> <S%H2009>Behold,<s%> I <S%H8085>heard<s%> <S%H853><s%> thy <S%H1>father<s%> <S%H1696>speak<s%> <S%H413>unto<s%> <S%H6215>Esau<s%> thy <S%H251>brother,<s%> <S%H559>saying,<s%>

Bring <S%H935><s%> me <S%H6718>venison,<s%> and <S%H6213>make<s%> me savory <S%H4303>meat,<s%> that I may <S%H398>eat,<s%> and <S%H1288>bless<s%> thee <S%H6440>before<s%> the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> <S%H6440>before<s%> my <S%H4194>death.<s%>
Now <S%H6258><s%> therefore, my <S%H1121>son,<s%> <S%H8085>obey<s%> my <S%H6963>voice<s%> according to that <S%H834>which<s%> <S%H589>I<s%> <S%H6680>command<s%> thee.

Go <S%H1980><s%> <S%H4994>now<s%> <S%H413>to<s%> the <S%H6629>flock,<s%> and <S%H3947>fetch<s%> me from <S%H4480>thence<s%> <S%H8033><s%> <S%H8147>two<s%> <S%H2896>good<s%> <S%H1423>kids<s%> of the <S%H5795>goats;<s%> and I will <S%H6213>make<s%> them savory <S%H4303>meat<s%> for thy <S%H1>father,<s%> such <S%H834>as<s%> he loveth: <S%H157><s%>
And thou shalt <S%H935>bring<s%> it to thy <S%H1>father,<s%> that he may <S%H398>eat,<s%> and <S%H5668>that<s%> <S%H834><s%> he may <S%H1288>bless<s%> thee <S%H6440>before<s%> his <S%H4194>death.<s%>

And <S%H3290>Jacob<s%> <S%H559>said<s%> <S%H413>to<s%> <S%H7259>Rebekah<s%> his <S%H517>mother,<s%> <S%H2005>Behold,<s%> <S%H6215>Esau<s%> my <S%H251>brother<s%> is a <S%H8163>hairy<s%> <S%H376>man,<s%> and <S%H595>I<s%> am a <S%H2509>smooth<s%> man: <S%H376><s%>

My <S%H1>father<s%> <S%H194>peradventure<s%> will <S%H4959>feel<s%> me, and I shall <S%H1961>seem<s%> to <S%H5869>him<s%> as a <S%H8591>deceiver;<s%> and I shall <S%H935>bring<s%> a <S%H7045>curse<s%> <S%H5921>upon<s%> me, and <S%H3808>not<s%> a <S%H1293>blessing.<s%>

And his <S%H517>mother<s%> <S%H559>said<s%> unto him, <S%H5921>Upon<s%> me be thy <S%H7045>curse,<s%> my <S%H1121>son:<s%> <S%H389>only<s%> <S%H8085>obey<s%> my <S%H6963>voice,<s%> and <S%H1980>go<s%> <S%H3947>fetch<s%> me them.

And he <S%H1980>went,<s%> and <S%H3947>fetched,<s%> and <S%H935>brought<s%> them to his <S%H517>mother:<s%> and his <S%H517>mother<s%> <S%H6213>made<s%> savory <S%H4303>meat,<s%> such <S%H834>as<s%> his <S%H1>father<s%> <S%H157>loved.<s%>

And <S%H7259>Rebekah<s%> <S%H3947>took<s%> <S%H853><s%> <S%H2530>goodly<s%> <S%H899>raiment<s%> of her <S%H1419>eldest<s%> <S%H1121>son<s%> <S%H6215>Esau,<s%> <S%H834>which<s%> were <S%H854>with<s%> her in the <S%H1004>house,<s%> and put them <S%H3847>upon<s%> <S%H853><s%> <S%H3290>Jacob<s%> her <S%H6996>younger<s%> son: <S%H1121><s%>

And she <S%H3847>put<s%> the <S%H5785>skins<s%> of the <S%H1423>kids<s%> of the <S%H5795>goats<s%> <S%H5921>upon<s%> his <S%H3027>hands,<s%> and <S%H5921>upon<s%> the <S%H2513>smooth<s%> of his neck: <S%H6677><s%>

And she <S%H5414>gave<s%> <S%H853><s%> the savory <S%H4303>meat<s%> and the <S%H3899>bread,<s%> <S%H834>which<s%> she had <S%H6213>prepared,<s%> into the <S%H3027>hand<s%> of her <S%H1121>son<s%> <S%H3290>Jacob.<s%>

And he <S%H935>came<s%> <S%H413>unto<s%> his <S%H1>father,<s%> and <S%H559>said,<s%> My <S%H1>father:<s%> and he <S%H559>said,<s%> <S%H2009>Here<s%> am I; <S%H4310>who<s%> art <S%H859>thou,<s%> my <S%H1121>son?<s%>

And <S%H3290>Jacob<s%> <S%H559>said<s%> <S%H413>unto<s%> his <S%H1>father,<s%> <S%H595>I<s%> am <S%H6215>Esau<s%> thy <S%H1060>firstborn;<s%> I have <S%H6213>done<s%> according <S%H834>as<s%> thou <S%H1696>biddest<s%> <S%H413><s%> me: <S%H6965>arise,<s%> I pray <S%H4994>thee,<s%> <S%H3427>sit<s%> and <S%H398>eat<s%> of my <S%H4480>venison,<s%> <S%H6718><s%> <S%H5668>that<s%> thy <S%H5315>soul<s%> may <S%H1288>bless<s%> me.

And <S%H3327>Isaac<s%> <S%H559>said<s%> <S%H413>unto<s%> his <S%H1121>son,<s%> <S%H4100>How<s%> is <S%H2088>it<s%> that thou hast <S%H4672>found<s%> it so <S%H4116>quickly,<s%> my <S%H1121>son?<s%> And he <S%H559>said,<s%> <S%H3588>Because<s%> the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> thy <S%H430>God<s%> <S%H7136>brought<s%> it <S%H6440>to<s%> me.

And <S%H3327>Isaac<s%> <S%H559>said<s%> <S%H413>unto<s%> <S%H3290>Jacob,<s%> Come <S%H5066>near,<s%> I pray <S%H4994>thee,<s%> that I may <S%H4184>feel<s%> thee, my <S%H1121>son,<s%> whether <S%H859>thou<s%> be my <S%H2088>very<s%> <S%H1121>son<s%> <S%H6215>Esau<s%> <S%H518>or<s%> <S%H3808>not.<s%>

And <S%H3290>Jacob<s%> went <S%H5066>near<s%> <S%H413>unto<s%> <S%H3327>Isaac<s%> his <S%H1>father;<s%> and he <S%H4959>felt<s%> him, and <S%H559>said,<s%> The <S%H6963>voice<s%> is <S%H3290>Jacob's<s%> <S%H6963>voice,<s%> but the <S%H3027>hands<s%> are the <S%H3027>hands<s%> of <S%H6215>Esau.<s%>

And he <S%H5234>discerned<s%> him <S%H3808>not,<s%> <S%H3588>because<s%> his <S%H3027>hands<s%> <S%H1961>were<s%> <S%H8163>hairy,<s%> as his <S%H251>brother<s%> <S%H6215>Esau's<s%> <S%H3027>hands:<s%> so he <S%H1288>blessed<s%> him.
And he <S%H559>said,<s%> Art <S%H859>thou<s%> my <S%H2088>very<s%> <S%H1121>son<s%> <S%H6215>Esau?<s%> And he <S%H559>said,<s%> <S%H589>I<s%> am.

And he <S%H559>said,<s%> Bring it <S%H5066>near<s%> to me, and I will <S%H398>eat<s%> of my <S%H1121>son's<s%> <S%H4480>venison,<s%> <S%H6718><s%> <S%H4616>that<s%> my <S%H5315>soul<s%> may <S%H1288>bless<s%> thee. And he brought it <S%H5066>near<s%> to him, and he did <S%H398>eat:<s%> and he <S%H935>brought<s%> him <S%H3196>wine,<s%> and he <S%H8354>drank.<s%>
And his <S%H1>father<s%> <S%H3327>Isaac<s%> <S%H559>said<s%> <S%H413>unto<s%> him, Come <S%H5066>near<s%> <S%H4994>now,<s%> and <S%H5401>kiss<s%> me, my <S%H1121>son.<s%>

And he came <S%H5066>near,<s%> and <S%H5401>kissed<s%> him: and he <S%H7306>smelled<s%> <S%H853><s%> the <S%H7381>smell<s%> of his <S%H899>raiment,<s%> and <S%H1288>blessed<s%> him, and <S%H559>said,<s%> <S%H7200>See,<s%> the <S%H7381>smell<s%> of my <S%H1121>son<s%> is as the <S%H7381>smell<s%> of a <S%H7704>field<s%> <S%H834>which<s%> the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> hath blessed: <S%H1288><s%>

Therefore <S%H430>God<s%> <S%H5414>give<s%> thee of the <S%H4480>dew<s%> <S%H2919><s%> of <S%H8064>heaven,<s%> and the <S%H4924>fatness<s%> of the <S%H776>earth,<s%> and <S%H7230>plenty<s%> of <S%H1715>corn<s%> and wine: <S%H8492><s%>

Let <S%H5971>people<s%> <S%H5647>serve<s%> thee, and <S%H3816>nations<s%> bow <S%H7812>down<s%> to thee: <S%H1933>be<s%> <S%H1376>lord<s%> over thy <S%H251>brethren,<s%> and let thy <S%H517>mother's<s%> <S%H1121>sons<s%> bow <S%H7812>down<s%> to thee: <S%H779>cursed<s%> be every one that <S%H779>curseth<s%> thee, and <S%H1288>blessed<s%> be he that <S%H1288>blesseth<s%> thee.

And it came to <S%H1961>pass,<s%> as soon <S%H834>as<s%> <S%H3327>Isaac<s%> had made an <S%H3615>end<s%> of <S%H1288>blessing<s%> <S%H853><s%> <S%H3290>Jacob,<s%> and <S%H3290>Jacob<s%> <S%H1961>was<s%> <S%H389>yet<s%> scarce gone <S%H3318>out<s%> <S%H3318><s%> <S%H4480>from<s%> <S%H854><s%> the <S%H6440>presence<s%> of <S%H3327>Isaac<s%> his <S%H1>father,<s%> that <S%H6215>Esau<s%> his <S%H251>brother<s%> came <S%H935>in<s%> from his <S%H4480>hunting.<s%> <S%H6718><s%>

And <S%H1931>he<s%> <S%H1571>also<s%> had <S%H6213>made<s%> savory <S%H4303>meat,<s%> and <S%H935>brought<s%> it unto his <S%H1>father,<s%> and <S%H559>said<s%> unto his <S%H1>father,<s%> Let my <S%H1>father<s%> <S%H6965>arise,<s%> and <S%H398>eat<s%> of his <S%H1121>son's<s%> <S%H4480>venison,<s%> <S%H6718><s%> <S%H5668>that<s%> thy <S%H5315>soul<s%> may <S%H1288>bless<s%> me.

And <S%H3327>Isaac<s%> his <S%H1>father<s%> <S%H559>said<s%> unto him, <S%H4310>Who<s%> art <S%H859>thou?<s%> And he <S%H559>said,<s%> <S%H589>I<s%> am thy <S%H1121>son,<s%> thy <S%H1060>firstborn<s%> <S%H6215>Esau.<s%>

And <S%H3327>Isaac<s%> <S%H2729>trembled<s%> very <S%H2731>exceedingly,<s%> <S%H1419><s%> <S%H5704><s%> <S%H3966><s%> and <S%H559>said,<s%> <S%H4310>Who?<s%> <S%H645>where<s%> is <S%H1931>he<s%> that hath <S%H6679>taken<s%> <S%H6718>venison,<s%> and <S%H935>brought<s%> it me, and I have <S%H398>eaten<s%> of <S%H4480>all<s%> <S%H3605><s%> <S%H2962>before<s%> thou <S%H935>camest,<s%> and have <S%H1288>blessed<s%> him? <S%H1571>yea,<s%> and he shall <S%H1961>be<s%> <S%H1288>blessed.<s%>

And when <S%H6215>Esau<s%> <S%H8085>heard<s%> <S%H853><s%> the <S%H1697>words<s%> of his <S%H1>father,<s%> he <S%H6817>cried<s%> with a <S%H1419>great<s%> <S%H5704>and<s%> <S%H3966>exceeding<s%> <S%H4751>bitter<s%> <S%H6818>cry,<s%> and <S%H559>said<s%> unto his <S%H1>father,<s%> <S%H1288>Bless<s%> me, even <S%H589>me<s%> <S%H1571>also,<s%> O my <S%H1>father.<s%>
And he <S%H559>said,<s%> Thy <S%H251>brother<s%> <S%H935>came<s%> with <S%H4820>subtlety,<s%> and hath taken <S%H3947>away<s%> thy <S%H1293>blessing.<s%>

And he <S%H559>said,<s%> Is not he <S%H3588>rightly<s%> <S%H7121>named<s%> <S%H8034><s%> <S%H3290>Jacob?<s%> for he hath <S%H6117>supplanted<s%> me <S%H2088>these<s%> two <S%H6471>times:<s%> he took <S%H3947>away<s%> <S%H853><s%> my <S%H1062>birthright;<s%> and, <S%H2009>behold,<s%> <S%H6258>now<s%> he hath taken <S%H3947>away<s%> my <S%H1293>blessing.<s%> And he <S%H559>said,<s%> Hast thou <S%H3808>not<s%> <S%H680>reserved<s%> a <S%H1293>blessing<s%> for me?

And <S%H3327>Isaac<s%> <S%H6030>answered<s%> and <S%H559>said<s%> unto <S%H6215>Esau,<s%> <S%H2005>Behold,<s%> I have <S%H7760>made<s%> him thy <S%H1376>lord,<s%> and <S%H3605>all<s%> his <S%H251>brethren<s%> have I <S%H5414>given<s%> to him for <S%H5650>servants;<s%> and with <S%H1715>corn<s%> and <S%H8492>wine<s%> have I <S%H5564>sustained<s%> him: and <S%H4100>what<s%> shall I <S%H6213>do<s%> <S%H645>now<s%> unto thee, my <S%H1121>son?<s%>

And <S%H6215>Esau<s%> <S%H559>said<s%> <S%H413>unto<s%> his <S%H1>father,<s%> Hast thou but <S%H259>one<s%> <S%H1293>blessing,<s%> my <S%H1>father?<s%> <S%H1288>bless<s%> me, even <S%H589>me<s%> <S%H1571>also,<s%> O my <S%H1>father.<s%> And <S%H6215>Esau<s%> lifted <S%H5375>up<s%> his <S%H6963>voice,<s%> and <S%H1058>wept.<s%>

And <S%H3327>Isaac<s%> his <S%H1>father<s%> <S%H6030>answered<s%> and <S%H559>said<s%> <S%H413>unto<s%> him, <S%H2009>Behold,<s%> thy <S%H4186>dwelling<s%> shall <S%H1961>be<s%> the <S%H4480>fatness<s%> <S%H4924><s%> of the <S%H776>earth,<s%> and of the <S%H4480>dew<s%> <S%H2919><s%> of <S%H8064>heaven<s%> from <S%H4480>above;<s%> <S%H5920><s%>

And <S%H5921>by<s%> thy <S%H2719>sword<s%> shalt thou <S%H2421>live,<s%> and shalt <S%H5647>serve<s%> thy <S%H251>brother;<s%> and it shall come to <S%H1961>pass<s%> <S%H834>when<s%> thou shalt have the <S%H7300>dominion,<s%> that thou shalt <S%H6561>break<s%> his <S%H5923>yoke<s%> from <S%H4480>off<s%> <S%H5921><s%> thy <S%H6677>neck.<s%>

And <S%H6215>Esau<s%> <S%H7852>hated<s%> <S%H853><s%> <S%H3290>Jacob<s%> because <S%H5921>of<s%> the <S%H1293>blessing<s%> <S%H834>wherewith<s%> his <S%H1>father<s%> <S%H1288>blessed<s%> him: and <S%H6215>Esau<s%> <S%H559>said<s%> in his <S%H3820>heart,<s%> The <S%H3117>days<s%> of <S%H60>mourning<s%> for my <S%H1>father<s%> are at <S%H7126>hand;<s%> then will I <S%H2026>slay<s%> <S%H853><s%> my <S%H251>brother<s%> <S%H3290>Jacob.<s%>

And <S%H853><s%> these <S%H1697>words<s%> of <S%H6215>Esau<s%> her <S%H1419>elder<s%> <S%H1121>son<s%> were <S%H5046>told<s%> to <S%H7259>Rebekah:<s%> and she <S%H7971>sent<s%> and <S%H7121>called<s%> <S%H3290>Jacob<s%> her <S%H6996>younger<s%> <S%H1121>son,<s%> and <S%H559>said<s%> <S%H413>unto<s%> him, <S%H2009>Behold,<s%> thy <S%H251>brother<s%> <S%H6215>Esau,<s%> as touching thee, doth comfort <S%H5162>himself,<s%> purposing to <S%H2026>kill<s%> thee.

Now <S%H6258><s%> therefore, my <S%H1121>son,<s%> <S%H8085>obey<s%> my <S%H6963>voice;<s%> and <S%H6965>arise,<s%> <S%H1272>flee<s%> thou <S%H413>to<s%> <S%H3837>Laban<s%> my <S%H251>brother<s%> to <S%H2771>Haran;<s%>
